data.name: Speed Creators
data.detailed_description:
Race against your friends in one massive sprawling platformer level created by you and your friends!

First everyone is given a time limit to create and beat a small level. Then all levels that make it through are stitched together with checkpoints along the way. Then choose your game mode and run for glory! Use traps and blocks with special properties to make your level however you want, whether that's tough as nails or a satisfying parkour challenge. Decide on a theme to really bring out the atmosphere and mood.

Though mostly focused on multiplayer, you can create your own levels offline in a solo level editor and share them online. The possibilities are near endless.

Cool Features-


Online Multiplayer
Gameplay Modifiers
Play and Share Custom Levels
Intuitive Level editor
Tons of Traps and Blocks
Precise Platforming
Character customization
Hats, Lots Of Hats
and more...
data.about_the_game:

First everyone is given a time limit to create and beat a small level. Then all levels that make it through are stitched together with checkpoints along the way. Then choose your game mode and run for glory! Use traps and blocks with special properties to make your level however you want, whether that's tough as nails or a satisfying parkour challenge. data.short_description: A high speed multiplayer platformer where each player builds a slice of a sprawling level filled with traps and special blocks to compete and race against each other in a mad dash towards the finish line.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 10
  • Processor: 4GHz
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Dedicated GPU recommended
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: OS 10.10 or later
  • Processor: 4Gz
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Dedicated GPU recommended
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 50 MB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04+ or comparable
  • Processor: 3GHZ +
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Dedicated GPU recommended
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 50 MB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
